markdown.markdown: ```{css echo=FALSE} ``` ```{r, echo = F} knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.pos = 'H', echo = F, message = F, warning = F, dpi = 600, fig.align = "center", fig.asp = 0.62) # golden ratio ``` ## Education ```{r} edu <- read.csv("edu.csv") names(edu) <- NULL kableExtra::kable(edu, kable_format = "html", align = c("r", "l")) |> kableExtra::column_spec(1, width_min = "4cm") |> kableExtra::row_spec(row = 1:10, extra_css = "line-height: 1.2; padding: 10px") ``` ## Employment ```{r} empl <- read.csv("employ.csv") names(empl) <- NULL kableExtra::kable(empl, kable_format = "html", align = c("r", "l")) |> kableExtra::column_spec(1, width_min = "4cm") |> kableExtra::row_spec(row = 1:10, extra_css = "line-height: 1.2; padding: 10px") |> kableExtra::row_spec(row = c(4,6, 8, 10), bold = TRUE, italic = T, color = "grey") ``` ## Teaching ```{r} teach <- read.csv("Teach.csv") names(teach) <- NULL urls <- c("https://www.bne.unibe.ch/unibe/portal/microsites/BNE/content/e497827/e608437/e721277/e955542/pane1150436/e1144780/Abstract_Conclusion_FNE_Gurtner_ger.pdf", "", # data literacy class "https://osf.io/78ct6/") # psy and sust class) kableExtra::kable(teach, kable_format = "html", align = c("r", "l")) |> kableExtra::column_spec(1, width_min = "4cm") |> kableExtra::row_spec(row = 1:10, extra_css = "line-height: 1.2; padding: 10px") |> kableExtra::row_spec(1, hline_after = T) ``` ## Personal competences ```{r} persComp <- read.csv("persComp.csv") names(persComp) <- NULL kableExtra::kable(persComp, kable_format = "html") |> kableExtra::column_spec(1, width_min = "4cm") ``` ## Outreach activities - Member of researcher panel in the [„stories for future“ project](https://storiesforfuture.ch/) (since 2024) - Presentation in the Eco Summer Camp (2024) - Leader & Producer of Podcast [„Zukunftswerkstatt - Ideas and Pathways to tomorrow“](https://www.podcast.de/podcast/3277597/zukunftswerkstatt-ideen-und-wege-ins-morgen) (German, since 2023) - Presentation in the Eco Summer Camp (2023) - Participation in panel discussion on Sustainability, Environmental Group Belp (2023) - Franxini Nano talk: [“Yes we can - combat climate change with our brains”](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uhaeB4taTZk) (2021) - Public talk at Quadrat: [“Where can we go with this brain?”](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SnURgaTHwEA) (talk in Swissgerman, 2021) - Proofread “Die Gretchenfrage im 21. Jahrhundert“ by Markus Neuenschwander (2020) - Proofread [“Black mamba - or the power of imagination“](https://www.herder.de/leben/shop/p6/58389-black-mamba-oder-die-macht-der-imagination-ebook-epub/) by Prof. Fred Mast (2020)
